meanings.definition: A beautiful and charming young woman.
meanings.sent1: The town's annual festival featured many belles in elegant dresses.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the belle of the ball for her grace and beauty.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly called themselves the belles of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the sound of belles ringing.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with colorful flowers, each one a belle in its own right.

meanings.definition: A favorite or admired person or thing.
meanings.sent1: Among all the desserts, the chocolate cake was the belle of the buffet.
meanings.sent2: The classic car was a belle at the vintage car show.
meanings.sent3: The new movie quickly became the belle of the box office.
meanings.sent4: Her handmade jewelry was the belle of the craft fair.
meanings.sent5: The old book was a belle on the dusty shelf, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: The belles of the church bells could be heard throughout the town.
meanings.sent2: The thunderstorm outside produced belles that shook the windows.
meanings.sent3: The belles of the marching band echoed down the street during the parade.
meanings.sent4: The belles of the train whistle signaled the arrival of the locomotive.
meanings.sent5: The belles of the drum beats reverberated in the concert hall.
